short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Doodle Jump for Chrome Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

short.fil: Maglaro ng Doodle Jump para sa Chrome Game bilang extension ng Chrome - Maaari ding Maglaro nang walang Internet, subukan ito…
short.fr: Jouez au jeu Doodle Jump pour Chrome en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant…
short.he: שחק את Doodle Jump for Chrome כתוסף לכרום - יכול לשחק גם ללא אינטרנט, נסה זאת עכשיו!
short.hi: क्रोम एक्सटेंशन के रूप में डूडल जंप फॉर क्रोम गेम खेलें - इंटरनेट के बिना भी खेल सकते हैं, इसे अभी आज़माएं!
short.hr: Igrajte Doodle Jump za Chrome igru ​​kao proširenje za Chrome - Možete igrati i bez interneta, isprobajte sada!

short.id: Mainkan Doodle Jump untuk Game Chrome sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat Bermain tanpa Internet, coba sekarang!

short.ja: Chrome 拡張機能として Doodle Jump for Chrome ゲームをプレイ - インターネットなしでプレイすることもできます。今すぐお試しください。
short.ko: Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 Doodle Jump for Chrome 게임을 플레이하세요. 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 사용해 보세요!

short.sr: Играјте игру Доодле Јумп за Цхроме као проширење за Цхроме - такође можете да играте без интернета, испробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Doodle Jump for Chrome Game som ett Chrome-tillägg - Kan också spela utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่นเกม Doodle Jump สำหรับ Chrome เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเลยตอนนี้!
short.tr: Chrome Oyunu için Doodle Jump'ı Chrome uzantısı olarak oynayın - İnternet olmadan da oynayabilirsiniz, hemen deneyin!

short.vi: Chơi Doodle Jump cho Chrome Game dưới dạng tiện ích mở rộng của Chrome - Cũng có thể Chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây…
short.zh_CN: 作为 Chrome 扩展程序玩 Doodle Jump for Chrome 游戏 - 也可以在没有互联网的情况下玩，立即尝试！
short.zh_TW: 以 Chrome 擴充功能玩 Doodle Jump for Chrome 遊戲 - 也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，立即嘗試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play more games on the top-left menu.

Take the iconic Doodle Jump experience to new heights with the Doodle Jump for Chrome game! Leap into an adventure filled with endless platforms, quirky monsters, and exciting power-ups right in your Chrome browser. How high can you jump?

🚀 Endless Jumping Fun:
Bounce your way through a never-ending series of platforms as you aim for the highest score. Each jump takes you higher into the sky, but beware of the challenging obstacles and mischievous monsters that stand in your way.

🌈 Dynamic Environments:
Embark on a journey through vibrant and ever-changing backgrounds. Encounter unique challenges and surprises as you ascend through various atmospheric levels. Keep your eyes peeled for special platforms that can aid or challenge your upward journey!

👾 Crazy Monsters and Power-Ups:
Face off against a variety of whimsical monsters that aim to thwart your ascent. Collect power-ups along the way to gain advantages, from rocket boosts to trampolines, adding an extra layer of excitement to your jumping adventure.

🎨 Customization:
Personalize your Doodle Jumper with a range of skins and themes. Make your mark on the game and stand out as you bounce through the colorful doodle universe.

🏆 Challenge Your Friends:
Compete with friends and fellow Doodle Jumpers to see who can reach the highest score. Share your achievements on social media and invite others to join the jump-tastic fun!

🎵 Catchy Tunes:
Immerse yourself in the Doodle Jump experience with catchy tunes that enhance the whimsical atmosphere of the game. The upbeat soundtrack will keep you motivated as you aim for new heights.

🌐 Full Button Redirect:
Experience seamless gameplay by clicking the full button, which will redirect you to the Doodle Jump website. Dive into the full Doodle Jump universe and explore additional features on the game's official site.

🔒 Privacy-Focused:
Rest assured, Doodle Jump for Chrome respects your privacy. Enjoy the game without unnecessary permissions or data collection—just pure, doodle-jumping enjoyment!
